Methanex Corporation is the global leader in 
methanol supply, distribution and marketing. As 
a Responsible Care® company, we are committed 
to the safe, ethical and environmentally sound 
management of the chemicals we make and use 
according to Codes of Practice established by the 
Chemistry Industry Association of Canada. Our Social 
Responsibility policies and principles are a natural evolution of this practice and are closely aligned with 
the company’s core values and business strategy. 
Wherever we do business, the well-being of our 
stakeholders is a key priority.
